mapper.select: SELECT pms_pk_plan.name, pms_pk_pattern.description AS plan_pattern, pms_pk_punch_record.content, pms_pk_punch_record.like_count, pms_pk_punch_record.agree_count, pms_pk_punch_record.disagree_count FROM pms_pk_plan, pms_pk_pattern, pms_pk_punch_record WHERE pms_pk_punch_record.id = #{punchId} AND pms_pk_plan.pk_pattern_id = pms_pk_pattern.id AND pms_pk_punch_record.pk_plan_id = pms_pk_plan.id
